query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_approval_requests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  fullName VARCHAR(255),
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'suspended') DEFAULT 'pending',
  requestedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  approvedBy VARCHAR(255),
  rejectionReason TEXT,
  suspensionReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_email (email)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_approval_requests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  fullName VARCHAR(255),
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'suspended') DEFAULT 'pending',
  requestedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  approvedBy VARCHAR(255),
  rejectionReason TEXT,
  suspensionReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_email (email)
);
